title: Prince John

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Tax a player, taking one charge of a limited use ability, turning it into 4 Malice
- For 1 Malice, Put an arrest warrant for another player. If they die tonight, gain 5 malice. If they die tomorrow, gain 4 malice instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Putting an arrest warrant out is not public.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Instead of taxing another player, you may instead arrest them. This will roleblock them tonight.
- Instead of putting a warrant out for a player, you may instead host an archery competition, where the highest attack value wins. Dark Magic members cannot compete. In the event of a tie, the older role wins. The prize: having one more vote to kill them.

desc:
Post 5427
*"This crown gives me a feeling of power!"*
